name: Ring Opening Pliers (Various Sizes)
description:
Introducing our Steel Ring Opening Pliers, available in 4 sizes to suit your needs:


Features:
  • - Curved tips to prevent rings from pinging away during opening.

  • Large:
    Size: 18cm (7 inches)
    Suitable for rings with internal diameter 10mm to 30mm.

  • Medium:
    Size: 15cm (6 inches)
    Suitable for rings with internal diameter 10mm to 26mm.

  • Small:
    Size: 13.5cm (5.5 inches)
    Suitable for rings with internal diameter 8mm to 16mm.

Upgrade your piercing toolkit with these reliable and versatile pliers today!

name: Cheyenne Hawk Pen Unio - Black
description:
The Cheyenne Hawk Pen Unio is the ultimate all-in-one tattoo pen, which combines the essence of all Hawk machines thanks to its adjustable stroke from 2.5 to 4.0mm.


The gentle Hawk Spirit for fine filling and soft shading and the strong Hawk Thunder for bold lines and powerful color packing are real classics of the tattoo industry. But what if you want to use both tattoo machines within one tattoo? And what if you'd like to have those tattoo machine features in the revolutionary form of the Hawk Pen?


Our answer to this is: Hawk Pen Unio.


Here the name says it all. You get the essence of our three Hawk machines combined in one pen-shaped tattoo machine with a continuously adjustable stroke from 2.5 mm (Hawk Spirit) to 4.0 mm (Hawk Thunder). Simply turning the stroke adjustment always gives you exactly the power you need for the specific tattoo situation. Switching between different strokes has never been easier.


Key Features & Benefits
  • - Steplessly adjustable stroke from 2.5 mm/0.10 inch to 4.0 mm/0.16 inch, perfect for all tattoo styles
  • - Stitch frequency from 65 to 140 Hz
  • - Steady Mode for constant force and stitch frequency in all tattooing situations
  • - Compatible with our three Disposable Grips which are hygienic and safely packed
  • - Steplessly adjustable needle depth (0 to 4.0 mm/0 - 0.16 inch)
  • - Removable grip fixture for easy cleaning
  • - Connection via rotating jack connection ensures maximum freedom of movement, innovative jack cage provides optimum protection for the plug connection
  • - Roll inhibition against unintentional rolling away of the pen
  • - Easy to cover
  • - Comes with a robust Cheyenne travel case
  • - Manufactured according to medical standard (ISO 13485)
  • - Made in Germany

name: Monsters Ink Phantom Tattoo Machine Additional Battery
description:
Please note: Machine not included.


Additional battery for our Monsters Ink Phantom Wireless Tattoo Machine.


Featuring 1000mAh battery capacity for long operation use with overload and short-circuits protection. Each battery has a 2 hour charging time and can run for 9 hours, ideal for those longer tattoo sittings.

name: Sorry Mom Tattoo Balm 40ml
description:
The Sorry Mom Tattoo Balm is an award-winning balm for regeneration and protection of new tattoos. Developed for a hassle-free and fast healing process.


Benefits
  • - Regenerative and protective

  • - Anti-inflammatory and calming

  • - Enriched with anti-bacterial additives

  • - Helps prevent irritation and itching


How to Use
  • - For the best results, apply the Tattoo Balm directly on the tattooed area

  • - Thoroughly cover the area and rub in circular motions until the balm has penetrated the skin

name: Cheyenne Hawk Thunder Tattoo Machine - Silver
description:
With the name Hawk, Cheyenne made tattoo history. The low weight, good ergonomic attributes, and excellent workmanship of the Hawk tattoo machines guarantee safe, clean, and gentle work. The 4mm stroke of the Hawk Thunder guarantees strong pigmentation while drawing the lines.

In 2007, Cheyenne gave the rotary machine a new face and revolutionized the tattoo machine market with the introduction of the Hawk. The low weight and barely noticeable vibrations allow long tattoo sessions with the highest precision minus the fatigue. The focus on power combined with smooth running, ergonomics, and quality has taken rotary machines to a new level.

Today, Hawk Spirit and Hawk Thunder are probably the most frequently used tattoo machines worldwide. Their users know why: You get a robust machine with an unbeatable price-performance ratio. Due to its stroke of 4mm, the Hawk Thunder is the perfect choice for strong powered lining and colour packing.


Benefits
- Silver edition
- Low vibration and volume
- Stroke of 4mm/0.16 inch
- Responsive Mode for reactive hit and stitch frequency
- Perfect for lines
- Can be customized with 2 Hawk grips of different sizes (S: 22.0 mm/0.87 inch, M: 25.4 mm/1.00 inch)
- Adjustable needle depth (0 â€“ 4.0 mm/0 - 0.16 inch)
- Connection via movable jack connection ensures maximum freedom of movement, innovative jack cage guarantees optimum protection of the plug connection
- Manufactured according to medical standard (ISO 13485)
- Made in Germany

name: Unigloves Select Disposable Cups (Various Colours)
description:
The Unigloves Select Disposable Cups are a great addition to your studio supplies, ideal for use when changing between colours.


These cups are made from a high-quality plastic for a strong and resilient finish that can be relied on.


Holds 180ml. Available in black and pink, pack of 100.

name: Cotton Tree Petroleum Jelly 284g
description:
Petroleum Jelly is an essential item in any tattoo studio. It has a range of uses including during the tattooing process and in the aftercare too.


This petroleum jelly has been highly refined to provide you with an almost pure product. Petroleum jelly is used in tattooing to avoid irritation to the skin, keep a smooth track for the needle and to help avoid blood collecting and obscuring the vision of the artist.


It can also provide a protective layer once the tattoo is finished and help to clean and dry in the first few hours after it is finished.


Benefits
  • - Keeps area airtight
  • - Reduces Irritation
  • - Sooths and protects
  • - Lubricates during tattoo

name: Cheyenne Hawk Thunder Tattoo Machine - Black
description:
The Perfect Tattoo Machine For Lines and Dots

With the name Hawk, Cheyenne made tattoo history. The low weight, good ergonomic attributes and excellent workmanship of the Hawk tattoo machines guarantee safe, clean and gentle work. The 4mm stroke of the Hawk Thunder guarantees strong pigmentation while drawing the lines.


In 2007, Cheyenne gave the rotary machine a new face and revolutionised the tattoo machine market with the introduction of the Hawk. The low weight and barely noticeable vibrations allow long tattoo sessions with the highest precision minus the fatigue. The focus on power combined with smooth running, ergonomics and quality has taken rotary machines to a new level.


Today, Hawk Spirit and Hawk Thunder are probably the most frequently used tattoo machines worldwide. Their users know why: You get a robust machine with an unbeatable price-performance ratio. Due to its stroke of 4mm, the Hawk Thunder is the perfect choice for strong powered lining and colour packing.


Benefits
  • - Black edition
  • - Low vibration and volume
  • - Stroke of 4mm/0.16 inch
  • - Responsive Mode for reactive hit and stitch frequency
  • - Perfect for lines
  • - Can be customised with 2 Hawk grips of different sizes (S: 22.0 mm/0.87 inch, M: 25.4 mm/1.00 inch)
  • - Adjustable needle depth (0 â€“ 4.0 mm/0 - 0.16 inch)
  • - Connection via movable jack connection ensures maximum freedom of movement, innovative jack cage guarantees optimum protection of the plug connection
  • - Manufactured according to medical standard (ISO 13485)
  • - Made in Germany

name: Inksafe Black Cohesive Bandages / Grip Wrap (Box of 12)
description:
Add extra comfort to your existing grip without adding weight to it with the Inksafe Grip Wraps, these wraps are flexible but tough.


The cohesive bandage wrap will stick to itself! So it will not leave any sticky residue behind on your grip after use. Each box includes 12 rolls which are individually sealed so you will get plenty of use out of each roll.


Sizes
  • Box of 2.5cm x 4.5m Rolls
  • Box of 5cm x 4.5m Rolls
  • Box of 7.5cm x 4.5m Rolls
  • Box of 10cm x 4.5 Rolls

Benefits
  • - Self-adhesive wrap â€“ no clips or fasteners
  • - Wonâ€™t stick to the grip
  • - Lightweight adapts well to shaped grips
  • - High tensile strength
  • - Wrap will not slip so no need for frequent re-adjustments
  • - Adds comfort to your grips

name: Monsters Ink Cups 13mm x 10mm 100pcs
description:
Perfect for storing your ink while tattooing, Great when using lots of different colors in a piece. 

Bag of 100 cups, Please note these are Top Hat style ink Cups

name: Allegory Ultra Blak Tattoo Ink (Various Sizes)
description:
Best for lining, shading and blackouts
Allegory Ultra Blak offers the same smooth consistent blend like the rest of their range, but now in a their most concentrated formula to date.
This premier ink is for any artist looking to take their craft to the next level. Each bottle is heat sealed with a tamper resistant twist-dispensing top. Lot and expiration are printed on every bottle.

name: Sasha Masiuk x Bishop Wand Rotary Tattoo Machine (Artist Series) - Liner Edition
description:
Made in collaboration with renowned tattoo artist Sasha Masiuk, this limited-edition gem embodies precision, performance, and aesthetic finesse.
Powered by a bespoke Faulhauber Motor, this rotary tattoo machine is a harmony of power and precision. This liner edition houses a more robust motor for impactful lines and impeccable detailing. The Sasha Masiuk x Bishop Wand empowers you to elevate your tattoo artistry with unprecedented control.
Unparalleled aesthetics merge with functionality through the matte black cap and grip, exuding sophistication as you craft your masterpiece. The colour-coded middle part, known as the spline, lends practicality, allowing you to instantly identify your chosen tool amidst the creative flurry. Crafted in the USA from aircraft-grade aluminum, this machine is a testament to durability and precision.
Fine-tune your technique with adjustable needle depth, ranging from 0 to 4mm. With every element considered, the package includes an RCA Cord and Machine Case, accompanied by essential lubrication and paperwork, ensuring you're equipped to embark on your creative journey.

name: Intenze Zuper Black Tattoo Ink (Various Sizes)
description:
Zuper Black tattoo ink, the darkest and most intense black developed by Intenze Tattoo Ink!


Available in both 30ml and 360ml bottles.

name: FK Irons DarkLab: Delta Footswitch (Various Colors)
description:
Please note: This product is purchased from our supplier on an order-by-order basis. There will be a slight delay in your order being shipped. Contact us for more information.


FK Irons Dark Lab heavy duty precision footswitch. The very first footswitch was engineered to sustain your entire tattooing career, and its guaranteed for life!!


Key Features
  • - Built to last.
  • - Portable and lightweight, ideal for use in your studio and to travel with.
  • - Machined from Aircraft Grade Aluminium and anodised for durability.
  • - Super responsive thanks to the internal dual springs and hinge system.
  • - Anti-Skid pad keeps the pedal firmly in its place. No more chasing your footswitch.
  • - RCA Ready. Simply plug a fresh RCA cord and you'll be ready to go. This eliminates issues with faulty cables that used to cause the whole unit to go bad. If cable fails, simply replace it with a new one.
  • - Proudly engineered, manufactured and assembled in the USA by FK Irons.
  • - Guaranteed for LIFE!

NB: An RCA Cable is required to run this footswitch. This is not included with your purchase.

name: Cheyenne Foot Switch - Black
description:
The Robust Foot Switch With 360Â° Accessibility

The Cheyenne foot switch is an on/off switch that allows everyone to work comfortably.


The robust, non-slip foot switch convinces with its round shape, which allows access from all sides and guarantees maximum freedom when working.


Thanks to the special, strong springs with which the robust foot switch is equipped, the foot can be placed loosely on it without accidentally switching. Maximum freedom required for tattooing is provided by the thin, flexible connection cable with cinch plug, which is two meters long.


Benefits
  • - Accessible from all sides thanks to round, flat shape
  • - Non-slip stand
  • - Super robust material
  • - Thin, flexible cable (2m, 79 inch)
  • - Manufactured according to medical standard (ISO 13485)
  • - Made in Germany

name: Silverback Ink Black Th1rt3en Tattoo Ink (Various Sizes)
description:
Silverback Ink Black Th1rt3en is a dark black tattoo ink from the Black Th1rt3en and 3 Shade Grey Wash Series set.
The viscosities and surface tensions of these tattoos inks are completely different to what Silverback Ink has made in the past. Black Th1rt3en has a good body, fully coats the needle when tattooing, and is just a bit thicker than water. The 3 Shade Grey Wash tattoo inks are based on Silverback's best-selling grey washes (2, 4 and 8) and, just like the Black Th1rt3en, they are easy to fully saturate and to clean off your client and tubes.
Perfect for any tattooing styles, from dot work to portraits!
If you prefer more shades in your series, need to adjust for client skin tone, style, or subject matter, you can easily expand by mixing Black Th1rt3en with Dark Grey Wash to get the exact shade you need.
As with all Silverback Ink, Black Th1rt3en and 3 Shade Grey Wash tattoo inks are vegan-friendly and comply with EU Resolution ResAP(2008)1.

Benefits
  • - Produce distinct, consistent shades time after time

  • - The viscosity and surface tension of Black Th1rt3en is completely different than other Silverback products. It's got good body to it, which fully coats the needles and moves like black water (even though it's a tad thicker)

  • - Using Black Th1rt3en as the base, this series is easy to fully saturate as well as clean off your client and your tubes

  • - Experience closer healing shades with less "heal out"

  • - Easy to wipe off the skin and goes in as easily as it wipes off

  • - Processed in a sterile facility

  • - Tested and certified for the EU

  • - Packaged with a 100% tamper evident seal

  • - Made in USA

  • - By a tattooer for tattooers!!

name: Cross Tweezers 8.8cm
description:
Introducing our Professional Steel Cross Tweezers, precision-crafted for various piercing procedures.

ðŸ”§ Features:
  • - Total Length: 8.8cm (88mm)

  • - Designed for precise handling and manipulation during piercing.

Upgrade your piercing toolkit with these reliable and compact cross tweezers today!

name: Kwadron Black Equaliser Neutron Wireless Tattoo Machine - 3.5mm Stroke
description:
After the great success of the Wireless Pen Stick and following the rapidly developing wireless technology in the tattoo industry, it is time to implement all the novelties and innovations in the new Equaliser machine. Introducing the Kwadron Black Equaliser Neutron Wireless tattoo machine.


The most important changes applied in Neutron are mainly the updated PCB, which is now much more stable and more resistant to damage. A small change has also appeared outside. The shape of the grip has been changed, thanks to which the machine lies more firmly in the hand.


It has been equipped with a removable battery (2 included) so that while you are working, one battery is in the machine, and the other is ready in the charger.


The machine, despite three different elements (power supply, cable and machine), is the size of a standard machine and weighs only 170g!


The housing is made entirely of aluminium, with a display and 3 buttons to operate the machine. The machine has a precise voltage adjustment every 0.1 V in the range of 5-12 V. (recommended 6-10 V)


The digital display shows 3 values:
  • - DC voltage
  • - Battery level
  • - Time from turning on the machine (resets each time it is turned off)

Key Features
  • - Black edition
  • - Removable battery
  • - An aluminium grip with a diameter of 32mm and two additional ones covered with anti-slip silicone with a diameter of 32 and 35mm
  • - Stroke: 3.5 mm (direct drive)
  • - 4.5 W motor
  • - Adjustable needle extension
  • - Working time: up to 8 hours
  • - Charging time: 2 hours
  • - Dimensions: length 130mm, diameter 32mm
  • - Weight: 170g (without batteries)
  • - Battery weight: 30g
  • - Compatible with most 18500 type batteries
  • - Adjustable voltage every 0.1 V in the range of 5-12 V (recommended 6-10 V)
  • - The set includes: a machine, 2 batteries, 2 additional grips, a charger that allows you to charge two batteries simultaneously
  • - 12-month manufacture's warranty

name: Unigloves Select Black Razors (Box of 100)
description:
The Unigloves Select Black Razors (Box of 100) are designed specifically for shaving hairs from an area you will be tattooing. This is important for making sure that hairs arenâ€™t pushed into the skin by the needle causing them to become ingrown. It also prevents the needle from getting clogged up with hairs.
The razor comes with a single blade sharp enough to remove hairs cleanly. Manufactured using high quality materials to make sure that the razor is strong and resilient so that you can rely on it. Made to the highest of standards and designed to meet your needs and expectations. A must have for the professional artist.


Benefits
  • - Ideal for removing body hair prior to tattoo designs being applied to the body
  • - The lightweight design delivers a close shave from the classic single fixed head blade
  • - Easy to hold and manoeuvre
  • - Suitable for dry shaving
  • - Comes complete with protective cap for additional hygiene
  • - Black colour to complement the Select Black range
  • - Stainless steel blade
  • - Single-edged
  • - Non-sterile
  • - Single use

name: FK Irons ONE Wireless Tattoo Machine Stealth (3 and 4)
description:
Please note: This product is purchased from our supplier on an order-by-order basis. There will be a slight delay in your order being shipped. Contact us for more information.


The ONE is a high-quality, dependable and affordable wireless tattoo machine for artists at all stages of their career, made by the experts at FK Irons.


FK Ironsâ€™ ONE is powered by a rechargeable and replaceable Panasonic NCR 18500A battery, offering 5-12 V of power for up to 8 hours - depending on voltage used and cartridge size - with adjustments in 0.5 V increments.


The proprietary quarter-turn battery hatch is easy to open, allowing you to replace the battery quickly with no fiddly threading system. The ruby cap also has a battery disconnect feature - turn the cap anti-clockwise to prevent unwanted power use. The batteries are charged through the supplied dual slot eFest battery charger, meaning you can always have a backup battery ready and waiting.


The simple display has an LED colour-coded voltage indicator and is controlled by three simple buttons - two for increasing and decreasing voltage, and one to turn the power on or off. Half increments are indicated with a flashing coloured LED.


Manufactured from medical- and aerospace-grade 6061 T6 aluminium, the ONE comes in a matte charcoal finish with a distinctive ruby end cap. The chunky grip has an ergonomic shape including larger grooves to prevent rolling and enhance comfort while working, and is compatible with all universal Cheyenne-type cartridges and modular FK grips.


The FK Irons ONE is supplied with a high-quality travel case with custom-cut protective foam, making it perfect for guest spots and conventions, and with the battery disconnect feature it wonâ€™t accidentally turn on while travelling. It is available with either a 3 or 4 mm fixed stroke length - please select the stroke length you require.


Key Features:
  • - Colour: Charcoal / Ruby
  • - Comes with 2x Panasonic NCR 18500A rechargeable and replaceable batteries
  • - Completely wireless operation
  • - Offers up to 8 hours of battery life
  • - Voltage: 5-12 V, adjustable in 0.5 V increments/decrements
  • - Three button control (up, down, power)
  • - eFest Dual Battery charging dock with cord
  • - Click-grip ratchet needle adjustment
  • - LED voltage indicator
  • - Battery disconnect
  • - Compatible with universal, Cheyenne-type cartridges
  • - Material: 6061 T6 aluminium
  • - Stroke length: 3.0 or 4.0 mm
  • - Diameter: 38 mm
  • - Length: 134 mm
  • - Weight: 227 g
  • - Includes a high-quality travel case with custom-cut protective foam
  • - Designed, engineered and manufactured in the USA

name: Mini Size Steel Foerster Forceps (Various Sizes)
description:
Introducing our Mini Size Steel Foerster Forceps, also known as Sponge Clamps, designed for precision in various medical procedures.


ðŸ”§ Features:
  • - Available in two variations: Closed End or Open End (Split).

  • - Closed End: Total Length of 16.5cm.

  • - Open End/Split: Total Length of 15.5cm.

Upgrade your medical toolkit with these versatile and reliable forceps today!

name: FK Irons Darklab: Killswitch Stealth
description:
Please note: This product is purchased from our supplier on an order-by-order basis. There will be a slight delay in your order being shipped. Contact us for more information.


The Darklab Killswitch is FK Irons' first power switch and features an accelerometer sensor with no mechanical parts, meaning complete wireless control.


With just a simple tap of the Killswitch, you can turn your connected Darklab device on or off, while the built-in, anti-slip mount will keep the power switch in place. It also features responsive LED indicators and an internal, long-lasting rechargeable battery.


Designed with sanitation in mind, the Darklab Killswitch will minimize cross-contamination and help to keep your workplace clean and tidy.


The Killswitch can be connected to the Darklab app via Bluetooth for wireless firmware updates, to toggle the power of the device, and to expand the features of the PowerBolt+.


The Darklab Killswitch is compatible with the PowerBolt+, PowerBolt II, PowerBolt II+, Lightning Bolt and Airbolt from FK Irons. Please note, the Darklab Killswitch is not compatible with the original PowerBolt.


Key Features:
  • - Color: Stealth
  • - Power-controlled by an accelerometer sensor with no mechanical parts
  • - Responsive LED indicators
  • - Internal, long-lasting rechargeable battery
  • - Built-in, anti-slip mount
  • - Designed with sanitation in mind - minimize cross-contamination
  • - Can be connected to Darklab app via Bluetooth for wireless firmware updates
  • - Compatible with PowerBolt+, PowerBolt II, PowerBolt II+, Lightning Bolt and Airbolt
  • - USB-C connection
  • - Charging Voltage: 5 V DC
  • - Charging Current: 0.5 A
  • - Dimensions (D x H): 95 x 20 mm
  • - Weight: 104 g

name: Kidney Trays (Various Sizes)
description:
Introducing our Professional Steel Kidney Trays, essential for maintaining organization and cleanliness during piercing procedures.

ðŸ”§ Features:
  • - Available in widths of 15cm (6 inches), 20cm (8 inches), and 25cm (10 inches).

  • - Designed to accommodate various sizes of piercing instruments and materials.

Upgrade your piercing workspace with these versatile and reliable kidney trays today!

name: Critical Universal Battery Dock
description:
The Critical Universal Battery Dock

is capable of fast-charging your Critical Universal Batteries in just 2-3 hours from depleted, to full.


Both slots can charge both battery options (RCA & 3.5mm). The magnetic base allows easy and secure placement in your working environment. The Critical Universal Battery can be placed and removed from the docking station with just one hand, perfect for a quick change while working.


Universal Battery Dock Features:
  • - Compatible for both RCA & 3.5mm Critical Universal Batteries
  • - Two charge slots for Universal Critical Batteries
  • - Unlimited magnetic mounting capabilities
  • - Batteries fit easily, precisely & will stay in place at most angles
  • - Quick battery swap; "one handed battery change"
  • - Approximately 2-3 hrs charge time from depleted to full

Universal Battery Dock Specifications:
  • - Dimensions: 2" x 4" x 1.2" (5.1cm x 10.2cm x 3.0cm)
  • - USB-C Cable
  • - USB-C Wall Plug
  • - Colour: Black

Please note: This only includes the Critical Universal Battery Dock. Batteries sold separate or as a full bundle.

name: Dragonhawk Mast Tour Y22 Wireless Pen PMU Tattoo Machine (Various Colors)
description:
This highly adaptable and slimline pen-style tattoo machine from Dragonhawk provides reliable power with a good direct hit every time!
The Mast Tour Y22 is thin and light, reducing energy consumption as you work, and features a stainless steel spring for a solid hit. Its 3 mm stroke length and 5-12 V of power make it ideal for all kinds of tattoo techniques, from fine dotwork and lining to colour packing and shading.

Specifications:
  • - Stroke length: 3 mm

  • - Working voltage: 5-12 V

  • - Custom Mast coreless motor

  • - Adjustable needle depth

  • - Compatible with universal, Cheyenne-type needle cartridges

  • - USB-C connection

  • - RCA connection

  • - Jump-start function

  • - Diameter: 23.5 mm

  • - Length with battery: 153 mm

  • - Weight with battery: 138 g

name: Allegory Ink Shading Solution (Multiple Sizes)
description:
Meet the Allegory Shading Solution - the secret weapon for elevating your shading game. Whether you're a seasoned artist or just starting out, this solution is designed to amplify your pigments, making your shading techniques smoother and more vibrant than ever before.
Every bottle comes heat-sealed with a tamper-resistant twist-dispensing top, ensuring your solution stays fresh and secure. With Allegory Shading Solution, you're not just shading; you're crafting masterpieces with ease and precision.


Benefits
  • - Enhances pigment performance for richer, smoother shading

  • - Ideal for taking your shading techniques to the next level

  • - Heat-sealed for freshness and security

  • - Tamper-resistant twist-dispensing top for easy use

  • - Perfect for both seasoned artists and beginners

name: Dynamic Color Canary Yellow Tattoo Ink 30ml (1oz)
description:
A mid-range yellow, Dynamic Color Canary Yellow Tattoo Ink is a staple in every artistâ€™s collection.


This opaque yellow shade provides premium pigment content for artists to easily blend with other tattoo inks. Combine with Dynamic Color Blue Tattoo Ink for a vibrant green shade or any of the Dynamic Color Reds for electrifying variations of orange.


No matter how you use it, Canary Yellow is sure to please. For a staple primary color in your collection, you need Dynamic Color Canary Yellow.


Professional Quality Pre-Dispersed Inks:

Proudly made in the USA, Dynamic Color provides premium quality tattoo ink with the most impressive pigment content in the business. Noted for its smooth flow rate, these inks are up to piece - from precise detail work to outlining and shading.


Authentic and Hygienic:

Weâ€™re aware of the large volume of fraudulent products on the market, which is why all Dynamic Color inks arrive in crystal clear PET bottles with a Dynamic logo anti-counterfeiting coating. Even the heat seals, which secure your sterilised product, hold the Dynamic Color stamp of approval.


Time-Tested, Reliable Healing:

Say goodbye to stubborn healing processes or unhappy clients. Dynamic Color tattoo inks go in smooth and heal vibrantly for noticeably vivid results that can stand the test of time. And with skin in the game since 1990, we mean it when we say Dynamic inks are time-tested.


Bold, Bright, Long Lasting Colors:

Every artist deserves high-quality tattoo ink. Available in an expanded range of 30 colors, the high-pigment inks can be mixed to create your own custom blends. With Dynamic Color tattoo ink in your needle, the only limit is your own imagination.


Vegan and Never Tested on Animals:

Dynamic Color products contain zero animal products and are never tested on any furry friends. The tattoo inks are safe on the skin, better for the environment, and ultimately preferred for your overall.

name: Universal ND Clip-On Focus Lens with CPL Filter
description:
Attach the Clip-On ND Lens to your phone to enhance your photography. This neutral density filter reduces light intensity while preserving color accuracy, making it perfect for capturing your tattoos in bright settings. Adjust the light reduction level by rotating the front ring on the lens. This versatile lens also functions as a circular polarizing filter (CPL).


Key Features:
  • - Multicoated filter

  • - Adjustable density: ND2 to ND400

  • - Filter size: 37 mm

  • - Glass thickness: 2.2 mm

  • - Frame height: 11 mm

  • - Durable aluminum frame

name: FK Irons EXO Tattoo Machine 4mm Stroke (Wireless Shadow Camo) RCA Bolt + 2x Power Bolts
description:
Please note: This product is purchased from our supplier on an order-by-order basis. There will be a slight delay in your order being shipped. Contact us for more information.


The FK Irons EXO is the follow on from the US manufacturerâ€™s Spektra Flux wireless tattoo machine and offers unstoppable power, whether wired or wireless.


The EXO is fitted with the same 9-Watt brushless motor that features in the Flux. Itâ€™s ideal for colour packing and requires less passes to saturate ink, therefore reducing trauma to the skin.


FK Ironsâ€™ EXO rotary includes a 40 mm ergonomic grip, which makes it more comfortable to use during longer tattooing sessions. The grip is also forward-weighted, giving the EXO a pen-like feel that helps to eliminate wrist pain and allow for maximum needle control.


This version of the FK Irons EXO comes with 2x PowerBolts for wireless operation, as well as an RCA Bolt if you prefer to use a traditional power supply and RCA cable. When using the PowerBolt, you can connect to the DarkLab App via Bluetooth. If using the RCA Bolt, you can pair the EXO with the DarkLab Hover power supply to enable E-Give. Thanks to the removable RCA Bolt, you can easily convert the EXO to a wireless machine with the Spektra Flux PowerBolt.
Key Features:
  • - Colour: Shadow Camo
  • - Comes with 2x PowerBolts and 1x RCA Bolt
  • - Wireless (PowerBolt) â€“ no cables or power supplies needed
  • - Can connect to the DarkLab App via Bluetooth
  • - Wired (RCA Bolt) â€“ use with a traditional power supply and RCA cable or pair with DarkLab Hover to enable E-Give
  • - 9-Watt brushless motor
  • - Stroke length: 4.0 mm
  • - Ideal for colour packing
  • - 40 mm ergonomic, forward-weighted grip
  • - Reverse polarity protection
  • - Made in the USA

name: Microbeau Spektra Xion S PMU Permanent Makeup Machine
description:
Please note: This product is purchased from our supplier on an order-by-order basis. There will be a slight delay in your order being shipped. Contact us for more information.


The Microbeau Xion S is the Permanent Make-Up version of the FK Irons Xion. It has been developed and tested in cooperation with permanent make-up artists. Compared to the Xion, it has a smaller grip and a shorter stroke length (1.8 or 2.5mm). The smaller grip has a comfortable and ergonomic design and is more suited for how PMU artists are used to work. In addition, it is compatible with all tattoo cartridges and is easy to cover and handle. The short stroke length is optimal for the smaller needles and higher speeds, which are commonly used for PMU.


The powerful 6 Watt MotorBolt has been specifically designed for Microbeau and ensures optimal performance of your cartridges by providing maximum torque throughout the session. The RCA connection is concealed within the MotorBolt for extra reliability. The Xion S features adjustable stroke length, needle depth and give (softness), so it can be exactly set up to suit your preferences and needs. The Xion S gives you complete control over your machine and is therefore suitable for a wide range of permanent make-up styles.


Key Features:
  • - Adjustable give dial (up to 2mm): Simply turn the dial to adjust.
  • - Adjustable needle depth thanks to the click grip on the Xion S.
  • - Adjustable stroke length - 2.5mm and 1.8mm stroke wheels included.
  • - Ergonomic profile, making it easy to handle and cover.
  • - Specially designed 6 Watt MotorBolt.
  • - Concealed RCA connection.
  • - Autoclavable tapered grip.
  • - Compatible with all Cheyenne-type cartridges.

name: Tattoo Goo Complete Tattoo Aftercare Kit
description:
The complete tattoo aftercare kit is everything you need to heal a new tattoo and keep it looking as good as the day you got it.
It's not just for healing. Tattoo Goo is for the LIFE of your tattoo. To help maintain your bright colors, use the tattoo quick penetrating lotion. Tattoo Goo was designed to preserve and rejuvenate your ink colors, not just heal them.
Remember, a tattoo is a scar and scars take up to one year to heal. Yes, it's healed on the outside, but under the skin's surface, it's still healing for up to one year.

Kit includes:
  • - Tattoo Goo 3/4 oz

  • - Tattoo Goo Deep Cleansing Soap 2oz

  • - Tattoo Goo Quick Penetrating Lotion 2oz
